newsitem.title: USA: IBM researchers to debut encryption code - NYT.
newsitem.headline: IBM researchers to debut encryption code - NYT.

text.p: International Business Machines Corp is set to announce on Wednesday that two of its researchers have devised a new encryption formula which they claim is almost impossible to crack, the New York Times said.

The formula was still far from being used outside the lab, the Times said on Wednesday and it quoted the company as saying the solution did nothing to resolve a dispute between the federal government and the computer industry over whether law enforcers should have access to encrypted materials.

IBM Chairman Lou Gerstner will hold an annual meeting with Wall Street analysts on Wednesday. Analysts said they expected the meeting to be a discussion of the computer company's strategy and direction.
